names.pinyin: shu gan li qi zhi zhong yao

actions: Spreads Liver Qi and relieves Stagnation
Dredges Liver Qi, releases Stagnation, stops pain and conducts Heat out from below
Calms the Liver, benefits Yin, anchors Floating Yang, softens hardness and dissipates nodules.
Clears Liver Fire, clears Hot Phlegm and dissipates nodules.

symptoms: Distention and pain in the sides or flanks
Breast distention and pain before and during menses
